original_text: And they judged the people at all seasons: the hard causes they brought unto Moses, but every small matter they judged themselves.
korean_text: 그들이 때를 따라 백성을 재판하되 어려운 일은 모세에게 가져오고 모든 작은 일은 스스로 재판하더라

sentences.original_text: And they judged the people at all seasons
the hard causes they brought unto Moses
but every small matter they judged themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 모든 작은 문제는 스스로 재판했다
